channel.title: Listening World
channel.description:
So while I'm working at school lots of people (obviously) look at my stuff while I'm working and all of them are impressed. Few, ask me to do things for them. I rarely agree, but I didn't mind doing this one, and now I plan on doing it a lot more.
This kid is graduating this quarter and needs a logo for his portfolio stuff (he's not required to make it himself, it's not like he's graphic design, he's audio production). So he asks me a lot and I finally start doing it. We have a 4 hour class together and we did this in about 1 1/2 class periods. Concept started with him and I improved on it. But I had almost no say in it, he wanted many things changed so this suits his needs perfectly. Not saying I don't like the way it came out, looking back on it I like it quite a bit.
We did multiple versions, his other ones have a cord coming off and spelling his name. I put the watermark on there because it's his now and he can do what he wants with it, not really me, so.
What do you guys think?
[img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2798/hugep.png[/img]
PS: He just paid me $50, even though I told him it was easy and I didn't need any money. I'm also doing a logo for two other people and starting work on some VFX for some other people.

item.title: Listening World
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“g man i live, post:11, topic:298319”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=394713.msg2933597#msg2933597 date=1251417965]

Obviously a watermark interferes >_>

Yes I made it all. World is created with a variety of high quality textures of the world and some modeling/shader work.
[/quote]

lieing little kid. i have this pic aswell the earth is gold before you use hue.[/quote]

How about you prove it or fuck off?

Read full topic

item.title: Listening World
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:298319”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=394713.msg2958225#msg2958225 date=1252972107]
offtopic: when i take my laptop to school and im bored and start programming, people are always behind my shoulder saying “what the fuck is that”, etc. so i have to explain to them what im doing for like 30 min, and by the time im finished explaining, class is over :
[/quote]
Same here. <3 SIDE[/quote]during the time my laptop was fucked (like 3 months) and i had free periods, i would take my usb (with mingw and side) and use it on library computers and program on that. it was light-weight and win

now, i take my laptop again, so i use the ide of my preference (eclipse)

Read full topic

item.title: Listening World
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

grrr sth i was thinking of the exact same thing. Even though it wasn’t really your idea

I ditched the project because school started, but i kept the model in case it ever came up that i needed headphones :P.

aannnddd i just realized this thread is a bit old but i like it, The clouds/ice caps on the top come out to much, though.

Read full topic
